page.title: 11 MUIRHEAD CONT.
page.content: Muirhead would appear to be the centre of the surrounding villages.The village of Liff is approx. 2.5 km away and Fowlis Easter is 3.75 km away. Apart from its own wood and park Muirhead is only about 1.5 km from Camperdown Park which has a golf course, one of the best in country, and its own wood.Muirhead is also near Templeton Wood and Downfield golf course. Muirhead is a residential area consisting mainly of bungalows and detatched houses.The village is expanding and therefore the population is increasing.Gradually this in turn should lead to a reasessment of amenities and much improved facilities.
